>
[Abysium Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1408)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 96</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies by shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Abysium](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1405)

</column>

---

These glowing shields are crafted to ensure that the abysium used is safely contained within a durable outer shell. If the shield breaks, however, the toxic metal becomes exposed. When you use the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction against an adjacent creature's melee Strike, if the shield breaks, the creature is exposed to the abysium and is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) for a standard-grade shield or sickened 2 for a high-grade shield.
